topic.title: Is this right?
topic.body: Im new to all this & was checking out the porn categories. Its like at least half of it is fkn child porn? Does no one take this shit down?

1591900169_1NMBe5SUr5hbYNTzBMuvdBCAxQ81i.body: Guys i didnt search it. I literally just click the zero porn thing and that's it.
Also, it's not that I'm surprised it's here. Just in general. Also, you that are accusing of trying to find are fucking morons. lmfao

> [1bfqutudhtexlka](#comment_175_144CwRj8eynTUC9DtGHaNHR3wm9P2EhuAY): it's decentralized , so the best you can do is to stop searching for this stuff so you don't seed it for other peers

Some kinda stupid huh?

> [marcellusfagoti](#comment_3_14VqoVEkT68vis7i7gsKUqkDzKgDnVRA5Q): There is literally a whole internet dedicated to porn why search for it here of all places.Also finding child porn by mistake isn't common occurrence, you usually have to be looking for it.

You're the only moron thinking that it seems. Everyone else mentions how easy it is to run into. Fucking pedo.
